company_logo: Path to the company's logo image (preferably PNG format)
proposal_class: Type or title of the proposal (e.g., Cybersecurity Assessment)
proposal_bid: Bid or contract reference number issued by the client
date_today: The current date of the proposal submission (e.g., January 10, 2025)
company_ceo: Name of the company's CEO or signing authority
company_street: Street address of the company headquarters
company_state: State where the company is located
company_zip: ZIP code of the company location
company_phone: Main contact phone number for the company
proposal_org: Full name of the client or organization issuing the RFP
proposal_address: Mailing address of the organization issuing the RFP
date_returned: Date when the proposal is submitted back to the client
company_name: Registered name of the company submitting the proposal
company_esign: Path to the electronic signature image for signing the proposal
cert_elig: Path to the certificate of eligibility image or document
gen_para1: Introductory paragraph explaining the company’s understanding of the client’s needs and goals

auth_reps.name: Full name of the authorized representative
auth_reps.title: Job title of the representative

gen_para2: Company overview paragraph covering experience, services, and capabilities
proposal_class_image: Path to an optional image representing the proposal class (e.g., security diagram or icon)
gen_para3: Paragraph elaborating on certifications, partnerships, or service frameworks
gen_para4: Description of specialized security solutions and risk management expertise
gen_para5: Brief call to action or partnership invitation statement
gen_para6: Final overview paragraph encouraging trust and highlighting commitment to client success

customers.client: Name of the client or project engagement
customers.name: Name of the client contact person
customers.title: Job title of the client contact
customers.phone: Phone number of the client contact
customers.services: Bulleted list or summary of services delivered
customers.review: Testimonial or endorsement from the client

gen_para7: Paragraph introducing the project team and its qualifications
gen_para8: Paragraph summarizing the team’s overall cybersecurity experience
gen_para9: Paragraph emphasizing leadership expertise and strategic vision
proposal_due_date: Date and time when the proposal is due
scope_of_work: Summary of services and objectives described in the RFP
proposal_infrastructure: Overview of the client’s current IT infrastructure relevant to the proposal

assessments.area: Name of the assessment area (e.g., Cybersecurity Program Analysis)
scope_of_work: List of tasks or areas covered in this assessment
assessments.deliverables: Specific output or report that will be provided for this assessment

deliverables.title: Name or number of the deliverable
deliverables.description: Detailed explanation of what the deliverable includes

service_costs.description: Explanation of what is included in this service

project_cost: Total proposed project cost (sum of all service components)

terms_cond.title: Title of the term or condition (e.g., Firm Fixed Price Agreement)
terms_cond.description: Explanation or legal clarification of the term

pay_schedule.payment_percentage: Percentage of total payment to be made at this event
pay_schedule.amount: Monetary value of this payment milestone

summary_intro: Introductory paragraph to the executive summary highlighting the company’s strengths

summary.title: Key feature or value point (e.g., Proven Methodology)
summary.content: Details about that value or method in the context of the proposal

summary_conclusion: Final paragraph to summarize the value, invite collaboration, and close the proposal
